instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: It is not as if people would suddenly begin to behave better if we just gave them more facts and statistics, or better arguments.
output: Il ne faut pas s’attendre à ce que les gens commencent soudain à mieux se conduire si on leur donne plus de faits et de statistiques, ou de meilleurs arguments.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: In particular, advanced economies should implement fundamental productivity-enhancing reforms, the eurozone should strengthen the currency union, and emerging market and developing economies should boost their domestic sources of growth.
output: Il est en particulier nécessaire que les économies développées adoptent des réformes fondamentales d’optimisation de la productivité, que la zone euro renforce l’union monétaire, et que les marchés émergents et les économies en développement stimulent leurs sources domestiques de croissance.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Indeed, the new initiative, combined with others in health, education, and infrastructure, could be the greatest step so far toward achieving the Millennium Development Goals, the internationally agreed effort to reduce extreme poverty, disease, and hunger by half by 2015 .
output: En effet, cette nouvelle initiative, associée à celles relevant des domaines de la santé, de l’éducation et des infrastructures, pourrait être la plus grande avancée vers la réalisation des «\xa0Objectifs du millénaire pour le développement\xa0», l’action internationale visant à réduire de moitié l'extrême pauvreté, la faim et les maladies d’ici à 2015 .

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Many Germans today rightly feel that any system of fiscal transfers will morph into a permanent feeding tube, much the way that northern Italy has been propping up southern Italy for the last century.
output: Beaucoup d’Allemand aujourd’hui ont l’impression à juste titre que tout système de transferts fiscaux se transformera en perfusion permanente, largement similaire à la manière dont le nord de l’Italie a soutenu l’Italie du sud au long du siècle dernier.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: In October 2007, Cherkesov (now chief of one of the most obscure and powerful services, the Federal Anti-Drug Administration) published another essay in which he lamented his colleagues’ degradation: warriors had turned into traders, he complained.
output: En octobre 2007, Tcherkessov (désormais chef de l’Agence fédérale antidrogue, l'un des services les plus obscures et puissants) publiait une autre tribune dans laquelle il regrettait l'avilissement de ses collègues : les guerriers sont devenus des commerçants, s'est-il plaint.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Concentration of media ownership and control further fuels popular mistrust, setting the stage for citizen investigation to enter the vacuum.
output: La concentration de la propriété des médias et de leur contrôle renforce ce sentiment de défiance et incite des citoyens à combler eux-mêmes le vide.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.

This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Second, where they do consider harmonization, they could favor the less stringent of the original standards, unless there is credible evidence that it would not support the relevant regulatory objective.
output: Deuxièmement, sur la question de l'harmonisation, ils pourraient favoriser la moins stricte des normes originales, à moins d'une preuve crédible qui ne permette pas d'atteindre l'objectif de normalisation approprié.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Earlier, generals from a competing service, the FSB, had arrested Cherkesov’s deputy for “illegal bugging.”
output: Avant cela, les généraux d'un service concurrent, le FSB, avaient arrêté l'adjoint de Tcherkessov pour « pose de micros illégale ».

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: When Chancellor Schröder travels to Moscow for the Red Square celebrations, he should bear in mind Nazi Germany’s contribution to the Baltic tragedy.
output: Quand le Chancelier Schröder ira à Moscou pour assister aux commémorations de la Place Rouge, il lui faudra garder présent à l’esprit la part de responsabilité de l’Allemagne nazie dans la tragédie des États baltes.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: We need to convince each other that the fight against this common enemy has to be fought with a keen eye to balancing the needs of security with those of human and minority rights.
output: Nous devons nous convaincre les uns les autres que la lutte contre cet ennemi commun doit être menée sans oublier notre sécurité ni les droits de l'homme et les droits des minorités.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Yet what appealed to the outside world was not always an asset in the rough and tumble of Israeli politics.
output: Toutefois, ce qui plaisait au monde extérieur ne constituait pas toujours un avantage au coeur de la rudesse et de l'effondrement de la politique israélienne.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: But we cannot be complacent that the forces of national egoism will remain in check.
output: Mais nous ne pourrons pas nous contenter de faire pièce aux égoïsmes nationaux.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: The latter point, which no doubt reflects the Obama administration’s attempts to reform the dysfunctional system it inherited, is particularly important, as the sharpest declines in investment intentions were among those who had lost confidence in the government’s ability to regulate.
output: Ce regain de confiance est sans doute la conséquence des mesures de l'administration Obama visant à réformer le système dysfonctionnel dont elle a hérité. Il est particulièrement important, car le fléchissement quant aux intentions d'investissement a été le plus marqué chez ceux qui avaient perdu confiance dans la capacité du gouvernement à réguler.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: If government bond repayments to the BoJ continued, but were always offset by new BoJ bond purchases, and if the BoJ kept the interest rate on reserves at zero, the net effect would be the same as a debt write-off, but the fiction of “normal” central-bank operations could be maintained.
output: Si les remboursements des emprunts du gouvernement à la BoJ continuaient mais étaient en permanence compensés par de nouveaux achats d'obligations par la BoJ, et si la BoJ maintenait le taux d'intérêt sur les réserves à zéro, l'effet net serait équivalent à une annulation de dette, mais la fiction de la «\xa0normalité\xa0» des opérations de la banque centrale pourrait être maintenue.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: The Nuclear Non-Proliferation Treaty (NPT) has contained the number of nuclear states.
output: Le Traité sur la non-prolifération des armes nucléaires (TNP) a limité le nombre des états nucléaires.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Today, Kuchma rules as an all-powerful president.
output: A l'heure actuelle, Kuchma gouverne en tant que président tout puissant.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: These lessons apply equally to advanced economies, which also suffer from rising inequality and subtle forms of corruption.
output: Ces leçons s'appliquent également aux économies avancées, qui souffrent également de la montée des inégalités et de formes subtiles de corruption.

instruction: This task is to translate a news commentary given in English language into French language. Translate the input statement into the output language while preserving the numberical values, special characters and proper nouns and context of the commentary done.
input: Several factors make it possible that we are entering such a period.
output: Plusieurs facteurs font qu'il est possible que nous soyons en train d’entrer dans une telle période.
